big6.title: Big Six 25/26: Weekly Wage Bill Comparison
big6.paragraph: Manchester United ({unitedValueM}) sits in a competitive middle ground: below Manchester City ({cityValueM}), but above the Arsenal–Liverpool–Chelsea cluster (range {alcRangeLowM}–{alcRangeHighM}). Spurs represents the leanest profile ({spursValueM}). United is {gapToCityPct} vs City and {gapToChasingPct} above the Arsenal–Liverpool–Chelsea average; the bill is now more compressed, reducing internal wage ceiling pressure and improving future PSR/FFP flexibility.
big6.footnote: *Rivals average = average of the other five Big Six clubs.
